name: Cube Island (itch)
description:
GMTK 2019 Submission - "Only One"

Traditional arcades might grant you an ability to see everything you need to see at full-time. Every bit of information is right there to be seen.

But now the limited field of vision requires you to be imaginative and cautious in order to beat the game.

Spin the cube around to see potential hazards from other sides and safely make your way to the golden plate.

Only one cube.

Only one perspective.

Only one person can be the one beating this -- and that person is you.

Made with Love, Sweat and Tears by:
Peerawas Archavanuntakun -- @pondpiu
Sasin Ounpiyodom -- @
Sorapol Sroysuwan -- @ckhoarmnp
Aikdanai Sidhikosol -- @blutarche
